name: Heart Heist
description:
Heart Heist is a randomly-generated stealth game where you control a shadow who can blend into the environment to stay out of sight. Avoid drones and lasers to find your heart.

Controls:
- WASD or (LS)
- SPACE or (A) to hide
- R or (B) to restart

Requires Java!

Originally made for LD37 ("One Room"). Thanks to SeventhBeast for providing music.
